text: Giovanni Coppa (9 November 1925 â€“ 16 May 2016) was an Italian Cardinal of the Roman Catholic Church. He has served as a diplomat of the Holy See. He was elevated to cardinalate in 2007. He was born in Alba, Italy. Coppa died on 16 May 2016, aged 90. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Cardinals of the Holy Roman Church *Catholic-Hierarchy *Catholic-pages Category:1925 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Italian cardinals
